message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I’d like to know how I can set a deposit limit on my account to help me control my spending.

I completely understand, and I’d be happy to assist you with that. Let’s run through security so I can access your account and provide the next steps. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Daniel Smith, my email is daniel.s@example.com, and my date of birth is March 5, 1990.

Thanks, Daniel. That's all correct! You can set deposit limits by navigating to the 'Responsible Gaming' section in your account settings. You can choose to set daily, weekly, or monthly limits based on your preferences.
Okay, and once I set a limit, how quickly does it take effect?
If you decrease your limit, it will take effect immediately. However, if you decide to increase it, there will be a 24-hour cooling-off period before the change is applied.
Got it. And can I remove the limit later if I change my mind?
Yes, you can remove the deposit limit at any time, but similar to increasing limits, it will only take effect after the 24-hour cooling-off period for responsible gaming purposes.
Thanks for the information. I'll go ahead and set a limit now.
You're very welcome, Daniel! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
